title: Skin Shop; When will it return?
body: Actually just the title. I missed out on some very special skins, and I'm sure that I'm not alone. Say, with this new skin-oriented event (4 skins and a MAP skin), perhaps a personal shop/legacy shop is in order? Maybe I'm just desperate, but as we missed one last Christmas (not to mention the lack of such an event this new year/Lunar Revel), perhaps the time is nigh. What say you, Rito?

replies.body: Unfortunately, I'm not on the team that makes these sorts of decisions, nor have I seen any announcements for such an event anytime soon. I recommend keeping an eye on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any event announcements in the future!
